title: Trojan Shield Gaming LOL Recruitment

embed.description: Trojan Shield Gaming (TSG) is a multi gaming Esports team/clan based in Australia and is a revival of the previous team: Commonwealth Paladin Corps (CWPC) which was formed in 2013 in Dota 2. TSG was founded in 2014 after the CWPC was disbanded. Since 2014, TSG has been expanding into other games such as: CS:GO & LoL.

body:
Trojan Shield Gaming, is a new and innovative organisation that is hoping to break into the OPL. We are currently looking for players who are diamond or above and are interested in serious competitive league matches.  By joining our ranks, you and the team will receive a number of benefits

Benefits:

Entry into free and paid tournaments
Organisation of team skirmishes and events
Part of a great community of esport gamers
Contracts varying from 3 – 6 months
Carry the TSG name
Payment*1
Jerseys*2

These are just a few benefits that come with being sponsored with Trojan Shield Gaming. 

*1 Payment will come in the form of items within a set value range + 95% of tournament winnings. This is only applied once a team has won a tournament. (Can be negotiated)

*2 Jerseys will be shipped to teams who have shown 15 or more tournament wins.
